title: DocuSign Compensation | Software Engineer | Bangalore, India
content:
**Education**
* Education: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA - non engineering degree)
* Education Institute: Tier-N College
* Graduation Year: 2022

**Prior Experience**
* Years of Experience: 2.8
* Organization: Service Based Organization(Mid Scale)
* Compensation: INR 7,25,000 (Fixed + Variable)

**Offer**
* Date of the Offer: February 2025
* Company: DocuSign
* Title/Level: Software Engineer(P2)
* Location: Bangalore, India
* Work Mode: Hybrid
* Base: INR 29,00,000
* Variable Bonus: 5% (INR 1,45,000)
* Relocation: Nil
* Signing Bonus: Nil
* Stock(RSUs): $65K stock grant vested equally over 4 years
* Total compensation for the 1st year (Base + Bonus + Stocks): ~around INR 44,50,000
* Benefits: Standard DocuSign Benefits + $500 for one time WFH setup

**Overview**
Jumping from 7.25 LPA to 44.5 LPA seems very strange right???..... But for me it took 2 years of consistent hardwork & yup a lot of sacrifices. Here's the glimpse of the hardwork: grinding leetcode, regular participation(and upsolving) in the contests on Leetcode, learning system design, missing office parties, missing friends meetups, applying to jobs on various portals like a mad and offcourse facing a hell lot of rejections.
But things that kept me moving were continuous Faith in the God & the statement that **It can't happen in ONE DAY, But it will surely happen ONE DAY**.


**Offer Action**
I've accepted the offer & have joined DocuSign as a Software Engineer.
